abstract: The World Series is a great event, but it is not a great culinary event.
snippet: The World Series is a great event, but it is not a great culinary event.
lead_paragraph: All through the baseball playoffs, Mike Tanier will provide the Bats blog with daily updates on less-than-important developments from around the league.

headline.main: Treading Lightly Beyond Peanuts and Cracker Jack
